name: CTRL_ALT_DEL
description:
Hello! I'm an independent developer based in Cambridge (UK) with a pageant for teaching and accounting for accessibility. At the core I'm a programmer with a good design understanding and hope to use those skills to create new experiences for people of all races, genders and sexualities.

CTRL_ALT_DEL was created and published during my final year of university while the COVID-19 pandemic caused great harm to the world as well as to the my health.

CREDITS 

Core Developer: Oliver Cox

 === WARNING ===

THIS GAME CONTAINS FLICKERING LIGHTS THAT MAY PRESENT ISSUES TO PHOTOSENTITIVE INDIVIDUALS
